addQuestion.title: replace api
addQuestion.body: How to place this (from web GUI) stop loss order to close short position on huobi using rest API?

addQuestion.title: Code doesn't execute if condition when element text changes
addQuestion.body: When I get started the 1st if condition works fine but when $initialVal.text() changes to failed or finished my script goes in infinite loop.

addQuestion.title: Data Zero Offset with MySQL
addQuestion.body:
0


I'm currently plotting data in grafana that selects it from a table in MySQL, the thing is, my sensors are not calibrated, and never will (due to changes on the asset I'm monitoring). Because of that I need to offset the data before ploting it (similar to the Zero Offset function from Signal Express).

My idea was to select the first 50 rows, calculate their avarage, then subtract this value from the data. But I were not able to do it.
